methodsynopsis.sdesc: Execute any application/business logic for this action.
methodsynopsis.desc: In a typical database-driven application, execute() handles application logic itself and then proceeds to create a model instance. Once the model instance is initialized it handles all business logic for the action.A model should represent an entity in your application. This could be a user account, a shopping cart, or even a something as simple as a single product.
